Reviews.Title: BEST PHONE, PERIOD.
Reviews.Author: DEALHUNTER
Reviews.Content: Wanting a over sized screen to eliminate having to carry around a 7-8" tablet and a phone, I decided I needed a phablet would be a good option and I couldn't be happier. I tried out the Note 3, the Sony Z Ultra, HTC One Max and the Nokia 1520 and each of them were great in one way or another, but ultimately it was very obvious that I favored the Mega 6.3 over them all AND it was the cheapest! No amount of money can buy a better phone, believe me I tried to top this and simply couldn't.I can't possibly explain how much I enjoy this phone. Hands down, this is the best phablet available. LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Erica Nicole
Reviews.Content: Because i love my phone. It is the best one i have purchased thus far...not planning on buying another phone for a few yea

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Jorge Flores
Reviews.Content: By the price it is a great product, much better to visualize that any other phone.  Skype works great !!!
